#### Q33. Which choice will _not_ print:
- [ ] A
 bash 
 myVar = 5 
[[ $myVar -lt 10 ]] && echo 'Hello World'
- [x] B
 bash
 myVar = 5 
 [[ $myVar -lt 10 ]] || echo  'Hello World'
- [ ] C
 bash 
 myVar = 5 
 [[ ! $myVar -gt 10 ]] && echo 'Hello World'
- [ ] D
 bash
 myVar = 5
 [[ $myVar -gt 10 ]] || echo 'Hello World'
